description: [``botocore``] The release updates standard profile with 2 new fields that supports account-level engagement. Updated APIs include CreateProfile, UpdateProfile, MergeProfiles, SearchProfiles, BatchGetProfile, GetSegmentMembership, CreateSegmentDefinition, CreateSegmentEstimate.

[``botocore``] Added support for the force option for the EC2 instance terminate command. This feature enables customers to recover resources associated with an instance stuck in the shutting-down state as a result of rare issues caused by a frozen operating system or an underlying hardware problem.
[``botocore``] This release enables secondary IP addresses for Network Load Balancers.
[``botocore``] Add support for creating advanced rule-based matching workflows in AWS Entity Resolution.

[``botocore``] Added support for Route node, S3 Iceberg sources/targets, catalog Iceberg sources, DynamoDB ELT connector, AutoDataQuality evaluation, enhanced PII detection with redaction, Kinesis fan-out support, and new R-series worker types.
[``botocore``] Extend usage to include agentless hours and add CODE_REPOSITORY to aggregation resource type
[``botocore``] This release allows AWS IoT Core users to use their own AWS KMS keys for data protection
[``botocore``] Granular access control support for NEO-SAML with IAMFederation for AOS data source
[``botocore``] This release introduces support for Multi-tenant management
[``botocore``] Added ability to log session activity on a portal to an S3 bucket.

[``botocore``] Updated the default sts service endpoint from ``legacy`` to ``regional``. This behavior can be overridden using the ``sts_regional_endpoints`` setting in the shared AWS config file or the ``AWS_STS_REGIONAL_ENDPOINTS`` environment variable.
